name: Twin_Peaks:_Season_Two_Music_and_More
text:
Twin Peaks: Season Two Music and More
Twin Peaks: Season Two Music and More is a 2007 soundtrack album by Angelo Badalamenti, featuring music from the second season of Twin Peaks and from Twin Peaks: Fire Walk with Me.

Trivia
Before track 1, there is a bonus track (Hidden Track One Audio, HTOA) made of two pieces of music with a long silence between them. It can be reached by rewinding while playing the first track, length 4:19. The first hidden track has David Lynch saying a phone booth number to access the track "The Norwegians" on davidlynch.com. The second one is the on-set recording of Harriet Hayward reading her poem "It was Laura".
"Hayward Boogie" is referred to as "Credit Boogie" on one page of the booklet.
Before the CD release, "Night Bells" was named "Abstract Mood".
